title: Expert Android - Vol.1, 2014
description:
So, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve had your Android device for a while now. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve really gotten to know it, and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s probably become indispensable to you. Are you getting the most out of it, though? This is a question that springs to everyoneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mind sooner or later, as they realise that the immense computing power they have is barely being touched, and that theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve had the same apps on their home screens since day one. Perhaps a better question to ask would be this: what do you want your device to do for you? Would you like to bring all your favourite feeds together into an easily accessible interface, or check them from the lock screen? Do you want to stream music from your desktop iTunes library, or be able to throw your deviceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s videos onto a smart TV? Have you ever thought about having a go at making apps? Read on.

The complete guide to mastering Android

Non-root innovations
- Master your device with advanced techniques and ideas

Rooting fundamentals
- From flashing ROMs to fixing bricks, learn how to hack

Advanced modification
- Theme Android with custom graphics and learn to develop

Rom and app development
- Follow workflows for cooking ROMs and building apps

Live Android project
- See under the hood of a fully extended project example


Also inside...

Feature: 60 Expert Tips
- Find out what power users do with their devices

Unrooted
- Transfer all your data over to a new device
- Update your social media accounts simultaneously
- Automate certain actions based on preset triggers
- Automate your device sing Near File Communication
- Extend your device's battery by adapting advanced settings
- Speed up your device by cleaning the SD card
- Target your AVG virus scans for more efficient operation
- Create and change app icons on your device 
- Create a customised notifications centre
- Set up a third-party launcher on your device
- Use your phone as a portable hard drive
- Remotely connect to your office server
- Turn your device into a portable web server
- Securely connect to networks by using a proxy]
- Sideload Adobe's Flash Player onto your device
- Stream from your desktop iTunes library
- Share media across your devices with XBMC
- Stream content to your Android via DLNA
- Transform your device into a remote webcam
- Turn your laptop into an Android tablet

Rooted
- Feature: Essential guide to rooting
- Back up system apps with Nandroid
- Restore apps and data with Titanium Backup
- Flash a new ROM to your device using ROM Manager
- Discover Jelly Beans biggest competitor, CyanogenMod
- Make your phone behave like a tablet using Paranoid Android
- Leave lag behind with Android Revolution HD
- Debloat your Android device by hiding and removing apps
- Get the very latest version of Android onto your device
- Undervolt your device to improve battery life
- Speed up your device by overclocking the processor
- Protect your data and activity by using a firewall
- Downlaod faster by combining Wi-Fi and 3G/4G
- Convert your Android device into NAS for speedy transfers
- Block spam text messages and calls on your phone
- Add multi-touch gestures for improved device navigation
- Enhance the typography on your Android device
- Undelete files that have been accidentally removed
- Connect a PlayStation controller to your device
- Install the Ubuntu Touch Developer Preview on Android
- Feature: Reverse the root

Modification
- Recreate a custom Android theme on your device
- Design your own wallpaper and app icons
- Build your own set of widgets using UCCW
- Add custom gestures, swipe actions and infinite scrolling
- Share your theme on My Color Screen
- Feature: Developing for Android

Development
- Learn about the components of a ROM
- Extract and load an APK using APK Multi-Tool
- Edit PNG files in Photoshop to replace ROM graphics
- Re-insert the APK and successfully reboot
- Create a flashable 'install.zip' to share with other developers
- Understand Android apps from a developer's perspective
- Set up Eclipse to start building your first Android app
- Develop an interactive quiz app using Eclipse
- Test your app using the Android virtual device emulator
- Export your app onto a real Android device
- Understand the Android developer options
- Test your app by making it interact with a virtual SD card
- Control Android emulators and devices using ADB
- Connect your custom-made app to Google services
- Publish your app on the Google Play store
- Add adverts to your new app with InMobi

Project
- Extended project example: build a live wallpaper, part one
- Extended project example: build a live wallpaper, part two
